<title level="1" right="Hazard 3" pfs="">[Pendulum Blades](/Hazards.aspx?ID=250)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 75</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

Several swinging pendulums mounted with razor-sharp blades extend from the ceiling and slice into the room below.

---

**Stealth**
DC 20 (expert)

**Disable**
DC 20 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) to jam the gears and prevent the trap from being activated

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Swinging Blades** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) **Trigger** This trap must be manually activated by a creature adjacent to the southwest gear stack; **Effect** Blades swing down to strike at all creatures in area F2 before wrenching to a frozen halt against the opposite walls. All creatures in the central part of this room take 6d6+3 slashing damage (DC 20 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).
